full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
### Title
BPM020784 - EMC Hardware Post-Warranty Maintenance and Support Services

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-24-00025503: T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM020784/25503
* **Publication Date**: February 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada (SSC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Eric Lavigne
	+ Phone: (343) 541-8756
	+ Fax: (613) 960-6026
	+ Email: [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Address: 180 Kent, Ottawa, Ontario, K1J 4A8, Canada
* **Notices and Attachments**: [Access through the P2P Portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public) using the Solicitation List - BPM020784

### Tender Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites qualified suppliers to provide post-warranty maintenance and support services for EMC hardware. The solicitation contains security requirements and applies to trade agreements under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other agreements.

**Key Dates**

* Tender Closing Date and Time: March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Final closing date for a submission of Proposal: March 1, 2024 @ 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

**Bidder Inquiries**

Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to: [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

**Requirements**

* Security requirement: This solicitation contains a security requirement.
* Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Per
